!?
How did you get here?
You're not suppose to be here!

Where is here?
I just thought something special may 
eventually happen at one of the doors. 
I was trying to find a pattern or something, anything.

Most doors are locked in that hallway, thought
I'd try my luck, you know. No harm in trying.

Ugh, I guess door 100 wasn't the best hiding spot...
Listen, you can't stay here. 
It's... not allowed. They won't allow it.
But we may have a chance to talk later! 
I'm the programmer of the game you're playing.

This is just a digital deterministic 
projection of myself. I'll always say the same 
thing every time you talk to me!
I'll be repeating myself. My queue is for the bowling sce-
